summary: Mika (Riisa Naka) is a flight attendant on board an airplane scheduled to land at Haneda Airport. On the way to the airport the airplane's engine starts to burn. In order to save the 346 ... See full summary »
cast: Hideaki Itô|Tsuyoshi Ihara|Riisa Naka|Ryûta Satô|Yukijirô Hotaru|Shôhei Miura|Kentez Asaka|Ken'ichi Yajima|Saburô Tokitô|Satoshi Jinbo|Hiroyuki Hirayama|Chinami Suzuki|Ayana|Gregory Snelgar|Ai Katô|Gregory Gerville|Shinshô Nakamaru|Svetlana Jahana|Natalia Silkina|Yasushi Furukawa|Tôru Kizu|Jeff Wastila|Ariei Umefune
title: Brave Hearts: Umizaru
